titleStmt.title: A thousand notable things, of sundry sortes Wherof some are wonderfull, some straunge, some pleasant, diuers necessary, a great sort profitable and many very precious. ...
titleStmt.author: Lupton, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Charlewood, for Hughe Spooner, dwelling in Lumbardstreete at the signe of the Cradle,

notesStmt.note: In ten books, each with caption title.
Identified as STC 16957 on UMI microfilm reel 893.
Cambridge University Library copy is imperfect; lacks several leaves.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Cambridge University Library.
Appears at reel 893 (British Library copy) and at reel 1316 (Cambridge University Library).

place.placeName: Lumbardstreete at the signe of the Cradle
